entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
